div.p: In the course of this experiment, several uranyl samples have been investigated, among which a concentration series of chloride-to-uranyl-complexes. These data are still being interpreted at the moment. Another complex that has been studied is the trinitrato-uranyl-complex. The analysis of the EXAFS-spectrum of this complex has been compared with the UV-vis results that had been obtained in our lab earlier and the total study will be submitted shortly to Journal of the American Chemical Society.

figure.head: Figure 1 :
figure.figDesc: Figure 1: Fourier transforms of the U L III -edge k³-weighted EXAFS data of uranyl nitrate in aqueous solution (top) and [UO 2 (NO 3 ) 3 ] -in acetonitrile (bottom); experimental data as line and theoretical curve fit as dots.

figure.head: Figure 2 :
figure.figDesc: Figure 2: UV-Vis spectrum of UO 2 (ClO 4 ) 2 ⋅xH 2 O (dashed line) and [UO 2 (NO 3 ) 3 ] -(solid line) in acetonitrile at room temperature.
